There were no other sightings in Columbus on or around July 4th 2010
divs: sighting detailsi was outside with my family shooting fireworks and also enjoying some of the neighbors fireworks as well. as i was looking in the distance, i saw an orange glowing ball moving up and down in a weird way that convinced me it was not an aircraft of earth descendant. it then vanished behind trees\buildings.
